title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama2, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or REST API; macOS/Linux/Windows, Docker images included.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library wrapping Ollama’s REST API; sync & async, streaming support, PyPI package.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; npm package with Promise & stream APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration via Ollama LLM & embeddings classes; available on PyPI inside langchain-community.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; Docker one-liner, multi-user, markdown, code highlight.

title: ollama-cli (sugarforever/ollama-cli)
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, auto-completion; pip installable.

title: ollama-copilot (cmiller01/ollama-copilot)
summary: Turn Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style code completer; Neovim & VS Code extensions included.

title: ollama-rag (glangchain/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma; Gradio UI, one-click Docker.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact, Kotlin extensions, reactive streams.

title: ollama-nim (itsumura-h/ollama-nim)
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama REST API; nimble package with async dispatch.

title: ollama-discord (mikeggh/ollama-discord)
summary: Discord bot that routes user prompts to local Ollama models; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-helm (terrytangyuan/ollama-helm)
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes; GPU node selector, autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger (dagger-community/ollama-dagger)
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama as a CI service; caches models, exposes pipeline step.

title: ollama-chatgpt-plugin (samuelint/ollama-chatgpt-plugin)
summary: OpenAI ChatGPT plugin that proxies to Ollama; run local models inside ChatGPT UI.

title: ollama-rs (pepperoni21/ollama-rs)
summary: Rust crate for Ollama API; tokio-based async client,Serde models, published on crates.io.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET client for Ollama; NuGet package with IAsyncEnumerable streaming, DI-friendly.

title: ollama-rust (mdrokz/ollama-rust)
summary: Alternative lightweight Rust client; no tokio, sync only, single file.

title: ollama-streamlit (rclong/ollama-streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chat app template wired to Ollama; requirements.txt, one-command launch.

title: ollama-obsidian (joethei/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-backed AI assistant pane; template prompts, slash commands.

title: ollama-haystack (anakin87/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama generators & embedders; PyPI package deepset-ollama.
